channel.description: Recent content in Freelancing on Pixelsoba's blog

item.title: Freelancing: A Leap into Independence
item.description: May 27, 2021 This date celebrates three things: my 26th birthday, the day I resigned, and the beginning of this blog. The need to move forward I’ve always had this need to progress, even without a concrete objective, but knowing that I’m on a path where I’m making progress. After my BAC (high school diploma), I looked at all my friends who didn’t want to continue studying and went straight into work with some confusion.
